title: Portfolio Blog with Next.js 15
excerpt: A modern, fast, and SEO-friendly portfolio blog built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and MDX for content management.

body.raw:
# Portfolio Blog with Next.js 15

A production-ready portfolio blog application showcasing modern web development practices and technologies.

## Features

### âš¡ Performance First
- **Next.js 15** with App Router for optimal performance
- **Server Components** by default for better SEO and loading times
- **Static generation** for blog posts and projects
- **Optimized images** with next/image

### ðŸŽ¨ Modern Design
- **Tailwind CSS** for utility-first styling
- **Responsive design** that works on all devices
- **Dark/Light theme** with system preference detection
- **Clean typography** with @tailwindcss/typography

### ðŸ“ Content Management
- **MDX support** for rich content with React components
- **Contentlayer** for type-safe content management
- **Frontmatter validation** with Zod schemas
- **Draft posts** support for development

### ðŸ” SEO Optimized
- **Dynamic metadata** generation
- **Open Graph** and Twitter Card support
- **RSS feed** generation
- **Sitemap** generation
- **Structured data** for better search indexing

## Technical Stack

- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript for type safety
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom design system
- **Content**: MDX with Contentlayer
- **Code Highlighting**: Rehype Pretty Code with Shiki
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Deployment**: Vercel

## Architecture

### File Structure
```
app/
â”œâ”€â”€ layout.tsx          # Root layout with theme provider
â”œâ”€â”€ page.tsx            # Homepage with hero and featured content
â”œâ”€â”€ blog/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ page.tsx        # Blog listing with pagination
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ [slug]/
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ page.tsx    # Individual blog post
â”œâ”€â”€ projects/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ page.tsx        # Projects showcase
â”œâ”€â”€ about/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ page.tsx        # About page
â”œâ”€â”€ rss.xml/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ route.ts        # RSS feed generation
â””â”€â”€ sitemap.xml/
    â””â”€â”€ route.ts        # Sitemap generation

components/
â”œâ”€â”€ Header.tsx          # Navigation header
â”œâ”€â”€ Footer.tsx          # Site footer
â”œâ”€â”€ MdxComponents.tsx   # Custom MDX components
â”œâ”€â”€ PostCard.tsx        # Blog post preview card
â””â”€â”€ ProjectCard.tsx     # Project showcase card

lib/
â”œâ”€â”€ contentlayer.ts     # Content management utilities
â”œâ”€â”€ seo.ts             # SEO and metadata utilities
â”œâ”€â”€ rss.ts             # RSS feed generation
â””â”€â”€ sitemap.ts         # Sitemap generation

content/
â”œâ”€â”€ blog/              # Blog posts in MDX
â””â”€â”€ projects/          # Project descriptions in MDX
```

### Performance Optimizations

1. **Static Generation**: All blog posts and projects are statically generated at build time
2. **Image Optimization**: Automatic image optimization with next/image
3. **Code Splitting**: Automatic code splitting with Next.js
4. **Caching**: Aggressive caching strategies for static content
5. **Minimal JavaScript**: Server Components reduce client-side JavaScript

## Development Experience

- **Type Safety**: Full TypeScript support with strict mode
- **Content Validation**: Frontmatter validation with Zod schemas
- **Hot Reloading**: Instant updates during development
- **ESLint & Prettier**: Code formatting and linting
- **Git Hooks**: Pre-commit hooks for code quality

## Deployment

The application is optimized for deployment on Vercel with:

- Automatic deployments from GitHub
- Edge functions for API routes
- Global CDN for optimal performance
- Analytics and Core Web Vitals monitoring

## Key Learnings

1. **Next.js App Router**: Mastered the new App Router patterns and conventions
2. **Content Management**: Built a flexible content management system with Contentlayer
3. **Performance**: Achieved excellent Core Web Vitals scores through optimization
4. **SEO**: Implemented comprehensive SEO strategies for better discoverability
5. **Developer Experience**: Created a smooth development workflow with proper tooling

This project demonstrates modern web development best practices and serves as a foundation for building fast, scalable, and maintainable web applications.
